local_intent: Ensure white_plate is perceived, confirm a computed grasp pose is available, execute approach-and-align to the white_plate, set TCP yaw and verify orientation before subsequent pick actions.
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose(grasp_white_plate) executed earlier and produced a valid pose
White plate is within reachable workspace for approach
Robot base/frame alignment allows setting TCP yaw=0 and verifying orientation
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT approach phase: perception fallback for visibility, relies on previously computed grasp_white_plate, executes ApproachAndAlign with the annotated tolerance and timeout, and verifies orientation prior to pickup steps.
